title: In Naruto (the last movie), how were Naruto and Hinata able to breathe through space? - Quora
tags: The Last: Naruto the Movie (2014 movie)

response.answer_text: 1- It’s anime 2- The moon of Narutoverse isn’t the same as ours.Narutoverse’s moon was created when Hamoura and Hagoromo sealed Kaguya using the Rikudō: Chibaku Tensei Justsu (Six Paths: Planetary Devastation Technique). I’ve red before a hypothesis which I like that that justu took a part of the Earth’s atmosphere. That’s why there is Air on the moon in Narutoverse. 3- Because NaruHina is the best couple (LoL, Just Kidding, But I love them, hehe)

I actually didn't know the answer to this one had to do research but from the best I can tell the moon has a slight atmosphere according to the wiki it states that the moon is barren and covered in craters with a slight atmosphere so that's why they can breathe other then that there's the age old it's anime they can do whatever the writer wants sorry I don't have a better answer
